title: Bluedrop Announces Results of Annual and Special Meeting of Shareholders
description: ST. JOHN’S, Newfoundland and Labrador--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Bluedrop Performance Learning ("Bluedrop" or the "Corporation") (TSX-V: BPLI) is pleased to announce that the shareholders have voted in favour of all items brought before them at the Corporation's annua…
